title: Hashoter Hatov
overview: An Israeli police comedy. Danny Konfino is a police officer serving in a suburban police station. Although his quick temper often gets him into trouble, he is as honest as one can get and a highly dedicated crime fighter. With his anger management issues he tries to manouver between his dysfunctional family, his ex-girlfriend who turned Lesbian, a possible love affair with one of his colleagues and a statiion chief totally lacking any trait of self awareness and an obsession to branded hand cream.
